column9: It took about 6 weeks to see results but my skin is beautiful!!!!

column2: larissa117, 13-18 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: I've been using this product for about a year now and although I'm pleased that my skin is better than before, I still get small pimples on my cheeks, chin, and forehead. Also because this product is very drying I've noticed that my already oily T-Zone has become oilier than a french fry because it needs to produce even MORE oil to deal with the flaky dryness of my skin. I use this product religiously and I expected to see great results because my pediatrician prescribed it to me but I guess I just expected too much from this product. And although the price is good, I'd gladly pay double it to get a product that makes my skin completely clear and not uncomfortably dry.

this product is great for red pimples but not so much fr blackheads and whiteheads they tend to always come back and i have to squeeze them to get rid of them.  as far as the drying and redness goes i have very sensitive skin and this medicine has not dried out or hurt my skin at all and i have been using it for years

column2: xsandoss, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: I love benzaclin, and have been using it for years.  I have had great results, and if I get acne now, it's usually because I've been slacking on taking care of my face. Be careful because this stuff will bleach your towels and sheets if you aren't careful!

column2: Prune face , 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Started using after one week my face was very dry and stared turning red and flaky each day got worseand lotions only made it burn my face is starting to look like a prune and hurts when i make expressions so I am so unhappy and have the worst skin problem along with the 3 acne bumps which were not as noticable as my dry flaky face that really is red and burning and dry as dirt - will go back to dr with more problems now and looking worse!!!! Also made wrinkles appear from dry skin so unhappy could cry! Looked great till I put this on my face!

column2: smiley, 19-24 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: I started using it and it worked great then after a while it made my face so red and sunburnt feeling. I tried to moisturize which only made it worse. Now everything that i have used since this product that i have used before and has not bothered my face turns it really red and irritated.

column2: XD, 13-18 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: I first used this when I was 13 and the doctor prescribed it to me. I had such bad acne but it cleared up pretty fast. Within 3 months my skin had improved significantly.  I'm 16 now and I still use it although not as often because I have less acne, and it can be very drying. Keep the skin well-moisturized if you use this.

column2: 19-24 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: This is amazing!! I noticed results within the first week, it plateaued for a few months and made my face very tight and dry.  I have sensitive skin and lotions made it burn, but over a year later it has worked wonders, no itching, burning, and best of all no acne! It has even helped with some previous scarring!

column2: Lynn, 19-24 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: This medication has done wonders for my face. The very first week of using it, I saw minute small results. Heading into my second week I was totally blown away. I was seeing the acne dry up and disappear. Now it does make your face very tight and SUPER dry, but it is so worth it. I was able to wear it with makeup. I also used cocoa butter to rid away the scars while using it at the same time. I have only been using it for about give or take 3 weeks and my face is free from pimples. Just use it faithfully and correctly and you will see results. Now it may not work for everyone, but for those it will, trust this medication. What amazes me most about the product is it says results will show in a couple of weeks, but before i was reaching the second week it worked. And the second week just got better and better. I recommend this to anyone who wants to get rid of the acne. It really works and i'm just excited to have my skin back to normal!

column2: suzyq, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Caregiver)
column9: Had Allergic reation with hives on my daughter who is 13 yrs old.  Not Good product for everyone.

column2: kredneck71, 13-18 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Caregiver)
column9: This topical cream as worked wonders for my daughter. She has been on it for only two weeks and the difference is like night and day. It has dried her skin out but a good lotion has fixed that, well worth it.

column2: 19-24 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I am just now starting to see results today. But I have to say it is really starting to clear my skin up very well. I have to say at first it dried out my skin ALOT.. I also had a lot of peeling skin. But its starting to pay off. I suggest using a good lotion with this. Cant wait to see more results.

column2: 19-24 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Well I just started using this medication. Its maybe been about 2-3 weeks. I also use this in conjunction with tazorac. It does make my skin very very dry. Hope thats cause its working. Will give a update in a few more weeks.

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: I have both adult onset cystic acne and acne vulgaris. I've used this cream in conjunction with Tazorac (topical) and Adoxa and had unbelievable results!!  Even after discontinuing the use of the Adoxa from time to time, the BenzaClin continues to keep my skin pretty clear. I've tried everything out there except for Accutane and this stuff finally worked for me.
